familiarity: Familiarity: I did not own this car, but have driven this car.
review_text: The 2022 Mercedes-Benz GLC has a predicted reliability score of 78 out of 100. A J.D. Power predicted reliability score of 91-100 is considered the Best, 81-90 is Great, 70-80 is Average, and 0-69 is Fair and considered below average.The Mercedes-Benz GLC-Class competes often with the BMW X3 for luxury buyers. The Mercedes-Benz GLC-Class competes often with the BMW X3 for luxury buyers. The X3 is similarly comfortable with great powertrains, including an X3 M that gives the GLC AMG a run for its money.
